example.text: Additionally , since you 're going [*-4] to be hors de combat pretty soon with sprue , yaws , Delhi boil , the Granville wilt , liver fluke , bilharziasis , and a host of other complications of the hex [0]you 've aroused [*T*-3] , you-1 must n't expect [*-1] to be lionized [*] socially .
